api-functions.title: Build an API Function Library
api-functions.description: Create a reusable function library with proper signatures, type hints, and flexible parameters

automation-script.title: Build an Automation Script
automation-script.description: Create a batch processing script that iterates through data, applies transformations, and generates reports

calculator-app.title: Build a Calculator
calculator-app.description: Build a calculator application that handles arithmetic, comparisons, type conversions, and input validation

collection-cli-app.title: Build a CLI Collection App
collection-cli-app.description: Build a complete command-line application from scratch - create storage, get user input, display items, add validation, and save your data to files.

data-processor.title: Build a Data Processor
data-processor.description: Build a log parsing and data cleaning pipeline that reads, transforms, and aggregates data

data-store.title: Build a Data Store
data-store.description: Create an in-memory data store with lists, dictionaries, sets and proper data management

data-transformer.title: Build a Data Transformer
data-transformer.description: Create efficient data transformation pipelines using comprehensions and generators

error-handler.title: Build an Error Handler
error-handler.description: Create robust error handling with try/except, custom exceptions, and cleanup logic

file-manager.title: Build a File Manager
file-manager.description: Create a file management utility with reading, writing, path handling, and proper resource management

form-validator.title: Build a Form Validator
form-validator.description: Create validation logic for user input with conditional checks, pattern matching, and error handling

module-library.title: Build a Reusable Module
module-library.description: Design a well-structured, reusable Python module with clean APIs, data models, and robust error handling

oop-entity.title: Build an OOP Entity System
oop-entity.description: Build a class hierarchy with inheritance, properties, and class methods to model entities

python-basics.title: Build Your First Python Script
python-basics.description: Learn Python fundamentals from variables to imports while building a simple interactive script

text-adventure.title: Build a Text Adventure Game
text-adventure.description: Create an interactive text-based adventure with player state, inventory, commands, and game logic

text-formatter.title: Build a Text Formatter
text-formatter.description: Create a text processing utility that cleans, transforms, and formats user input
